RUGBY REFEREE WATCH
A smart watch with Wear OS 2.0 or greater connected to this phone via bluetooth is required to use this companion app.

DISCLAIMER:
This software is provided free of charge as a tool to track match time, yellow cards, penalties and match statistics.

Any software has the potential to crash so never rely on this app to keep score and ALWAYS have a backup watch on hand to save embarrassment!

If this app is helpful, please leave me a positive review on the play store. Feature requests welcome.

 INSTRUCTIONS:
 * Pressing the penalty buttons before match starts will cycle team colours.

 * Penalty counters will not increment more than once per 4 seconds to prevent accidental taps.

 * To cancel a penalty, long press the penalty counter.

 * For convenience, there is an U19 mode in the menu (35 min halves and 7 min Yellow Cards)

 * Click match time to start/stop all timers. Watch will vibrate to remind you when match clock is paused.

 * Press the centre menu button to move to next period or restart match.

 * Custom settings can also be sent to the watch using this app.
